org.clafer.compiler

Class ClaferOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clafer.compiler.ClaferOptions

  • public class ClaferOptions
extends Object
    Defines the options for the Clafer compiler. Start with the default options and configure it to your needs. For example, ClaferOptions.Default.preferSmallerInstances() will prefer smaller instances and use default settings for all the other option.
    Author:
    jimmy
